subject: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
Football
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Hernandez, 25, the former star New England Patriots tight end, had been charged in the June 2013 killing of Odin Lloyd, who was dating the sister of his fiancée.
snippet: Hernandez, 25, the former star New England Patriots tight end, had been charged in the June 2013 killing of Odin Lloyd, who was dating the sister of his fiancée.
